name: Slasher Night
description: A dynamic horror extension for Silly Tavern. Time progresses as you chat, horrors escalate, and characters fight to survive. How many will make it out alive?
author: Your Name

initialize_game.description: Start a new Slasher Night session with a list of characters.
initialize_game.example: /start_slash characters=[Danny, Wesley, Tiffany, Harrison, Ivy, Player]

kill_character.description: Mark a random character as missing or dead.
